measure.name: residential_hot_water_fixtures
measure.description: Adds (or replaces) residential hot water fixtures -- showers, sinks, and baths. For multifamily buildings, the hot water fixtures can be set for all units of the building. See https://github.com/NREL/resstock#workflows for supported workflows using this measure.
measure.modeler_description: Creates three new WaterUse:Equipment objects to represent showers, sinks, and baths in a home. OtherEquipment objects are also added to take into account the heat gain in the space due to hot water use.

argument.name: shower_mult
argument.display_name: Multiplier on shower hot water use
argument.description: Multiplier on Building America HSP shower hot water consumption. HSP prescribes shower hot water consumption of 14 + 4.67 * n_bedrooms gal/day at 110 F.

argument.name: sink_mult
argument.display_name: Multiplier on sink hot water use
argument.description: Multiplier on Building America HSP sink hot water consumption. HSP prescribes sink hot water consumption of 12.5 + 4.16 * n_bedrooms gal/day at 110 F.

argument.name: bath_mult
argument.display_name: Multiplier on bath hot water use
argument.description: Multiplier on Building America HSP bath hot water consumption. HSP prescribes bath hot water consumption of 3.5 + 1.17 * n_bedrooms gal/day at 110 F.

argument.name: plant_loop
argument.description: Select the plant loop for the hot water fixtures. 'auto' will try to choose the plant loop associated with the specified space. For multifamily buildings, 'auto' will choose the plant loop for each unit of the building.
